name: Jotamont
description: '''Jotamont''' (born '''Jorge Fernandes Monteiro'''; 1 October 1912 – 21 November 1998) was a [[Cape Verde]]an musician, trumpeter, and composer. He is regarded as one of the most significant figures in 20th-century [[Morna (music)|morna]] and [[coladeira]], helping to modernize Cape Verde’s traditional music for orchestral and concert settings.
